text: Piattoli is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Anna Bacherini Piattoli (1720–1788), Italian painter * Gaetano Piattoli (1703–c. 1770), Italian painter * Giuseppe Piattoli the Younger (1748-1834), Italian painter and engraver * Scipione Piattoli (1749–1809), Italian Catholic priest
title: Piattoli
